item.source: Are you going to ODC October 2014?

item.title: About the ODC Oct 2014 category
item.dc:creator: Adrian
item.description:
Open for Change is hosting an event on the 9th and 10th October 2014 in Amsterdam called the Open Development Camp.

The event aims to explore the idea of openness and look into many areas of its application within our society.

Open is in: open government, open data, open knowledge. Open is freedom and innovation, and the promise to empower us as citizens and consumers.

But is Open enough to cure the world’s pressing problems? Join us in Amsterdam to explore!

We expect to see a strong IATI presence at the event with existing publishers and donors, along with interested parties joining.

So let us know if you’re planning to go - and we’ll be seeing you there!

1 post - 1 participant

Read full topic
